import React from 'react'; import { useState ,useEffect} from 'react'; import student1 from '../../student1.png'; import {Container ,Card,Row, Col, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {getallproducts,getallcategories,getallcartitems,getallorders,addtocart,removefromcart} from '../../store/userSlice'; function Dashboard(){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const allproducts=useSelector(state=>state.user.allproducts[0]); const allcategories=useSelector(state=>state.user.allcategories[0]); const allorders=useSelector(state=>state.user.allorders[0]); const allcartitems=useSelector(state=>state.user.allcartitems[0]); const [productsearch,setproductsearch]=useState('') const [catfilter,setcatfilter]=useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getallproducts()); dispatch(getallcategories()); dispatch(getallorders()); dispatch(getallcartitems()); },[dispatch]) console.log(allproducts) var [s,sets]=React.useState(0) function handleallproducts(){ sets(0) } function handleallcategories(){ sets(1) } function handlecart(){ sets(2) } function handleorders(){ sets(3) } function handleaddcart(id){ sets(2) dispatch(addtocart(id)) } function handleremove(id){ dispatch(removefromcart(id)) } return (
All products
ALL CATEGORIES
CART
ORDERS
setproductsearch(e.target.value)}/> { allproducts&& allproducts.filter(product=>product.name.toLowerCase().includes(productsearch.toLowerCase())).map((product,ui) => (
{product.name}
{product.price}
{product.description}

))}
{ allproducts&& allproducts.filter(pro=>pro.category_id==catfilter).map((product,ui) => (
{product.name}
{product.price}
{product.description}
))}
{ allcartitems&& allcartitems.map((ci,ui) => (
{ci.product.name}
price:{ci.product.price}

quantity {ci.quantity}

payable:{ci.product.price*ci.quantity}

))}
) } export default Dashboard
